description: Actor Scarlett Johansson said Monday that OpenAI copied her voice for their new ChatGPT 4o chatbot despite her declining their request for her to provide the voice.
title: Scarlett Johansson says she was 'shocked, angered' when she heard ChatGPT voice that sounded like her

description: Michael Cohen admitted to stealing from the Trump Organization as a lawyer for former President Trump continued his cross-examination in the hush money trial. NBC News' Dasha Burns reports from outside the courthouse as the defense has finished their questioning and prosecutors have begun redirect.
title: Michael Cohen admits he stole from the Trump Organization during cross-examination

description: OpenAI said Monday that it is pausing use of a voice in its projects that many people have compared to Scarlett Johansson's in the sci-fi dystopia movie “Her.”
title: OpenAI pauses use of voice that many compared to Scarlett Johannson’s

description: Ed Dwight was set to be the first Black astronaut in the 1960s but his mission never launched. Now six decades later, at 90 years old, he’s made his mark in the record books aboard Blue Origin’s rocket. NBC’s Kaylee Hartung reports for TODAY.
title: First Black man trained as astronaut goes to space 63 years later

description: The International Criminal Court's chief prosecutor he would seek arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar.
title: International Criminal Court prosecutor applies for arrest warrants for Netanyahu and Hamas leader Sinwar

description: Both grief and relief greeted the death of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi after he was confirmed to have been among those killed in a helicopter crash on Sunday.
title: Grief, but also relief, for some after Iran President Ebrahim Raisi dies in helicopter crash

description: Michael Cohen will return to the witness stand in a New York courtroom for a third day of cross-examination by Donald Trump's lawyers Monday in what could be the final day of testimony in the first criminal trial of a former president.
title: Michael Cohen returns to witness stand as decision on Trump testimony in hush money trial looms

description: Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, a hardliner long seen as a potential successor to Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, was killed in a helicopter crash in mountainous terrain near the Azerbaijan border, state media said on Monday. NBC News' Claudio Lavanga has the latest on Early Today.
title: Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and others found dead at the site of a helicopter crash

description: President Ebrahim Raisi, 63, has died after the helicopter he was on crashed, Iranian state media has confirmed. It took rescuers several hours to reach the crash site amid bad weather and heavy fog.
title: Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi is dead, Iran state media says
